jobDescription: Job Title:Data AnalystDuration:6 Months +Location:Raritan, NJDuties /Objectives:Objective is to mine data tools and information from the internet and build effective data analytics tools:Ability load group of excel files and present a unified view of the dataAbility to filter, extract and present key performance data from excel filesAbility to load data & use other interactive data visualization tools such as TableauAbility to selectively collect log file data, database and images from medical device to a USB driveTasks/Responsibilities:Mine data collected off of AnalyzersWork with product managers on defining requirements for data extraction and presentation of informationWork with product managers on defining detailed requirements for additional required data extractionCreate detailed report output that present data in an easy to use, easy to understand and easy to visualize method.Ability to update tools with additional informationReport outputs as described above Skills Required:Advanced user of Microsoft ExcelOther SW experience would be a plusMicrosoft Visual StudioSoftware engineering experience would be plusTableauXML, C++ / C# Please click below to apply or feel free to call at 732-993-6125- provided by Dice  Data Analyst, Data Mining, data analytics, Tableau
